product_name: Imagine Surf Fit Stand Up Paddleboard - 11'
long_description: Speedy and durable, the Fit Stand Up Paddleboard from Imagine Surf offers recreational paddlers a displacement hull to cut through chop for flatwater touring, fitness and racing. Polyethylene formed with a blow-molding process allows the use of 20% post-consumer recycled content and forms a completely recyclable product. Full deck EVA pad, front deck bungee, 4 carry handles and the snap-in race fin all come standard, making the Imagine Surf Fit paddleboard a great value. 56 lb. weight; 30 in. width.
short_description: Speedy and durable, the Fit Stand Up Paddleboard from Imagine Surf offers recreational paddlers a displacement hull to cut through chop for flatwater touring, fitness and racing.
